message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at the special price of $120.  It's a great deal!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I can definitely see you value this item!  I could come down a bit to $110, but I can't go lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $95?
